overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains an active presence on multiple social media platforms, including Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky. With a total follower count of 3580 across all platforms, his engagement levels are promising, particularly in professional and academic content. His posts often focus on research, disinformation, and computational social science.
